stories.title: Create seed users command
stories.description: Create a new command to seed only users without expense data
acceptance_criteria: tools/db-console/src/commands/seed-users.ts exists
Command checks if each user already exists by email before creating
Command skips existing users and reports them as skipped
Command creates non-existing users with correct data
Command displays summary: X users created, Y users skipped
Command is blocked on production environment with appropriate message

stories.title: Create seed expenses command
stories.description: Create a new command to seed expense data for all existing users
acceptance_criteria: tools/db-console/src/commands/seed-expenses.ts exists
Command queries all existing users from the database
Command validates at least 2 users exist before proceeding
Command shows error and exits gracefully if fewer than 2 users exist
Command creates expenses distributed across all users
Command creates appropriate approvals and withdrawal approvals
Command is blocked on production environment with appropriate message
